glsa.title: xzgv: Multiple overflows
glsa.synopsis: xzgv contains multiple overflows that may lead to the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: xzgv is a picture viewer for X, with a thumbnail-based file selector.

description.p: Multiple overflows have been found in the image processing code of xzgv, including an integer overflow in the PRF parsing code (CAN-2004-0994).

impact.p: An attacker could entice a user to open or browse a specially-crafted image file, potentially resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the rights of the user running xzgv.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All xzgv users should upgrade to the latest version:
